entry.title: [ERI1][Cooling System] - E102H08 / E102H09
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 10, 06:30 - 11:00 UTC

Apr 18, 23:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 10/05/2023 06:30 UTC
End time : 10/05/2023 11:00 UTC
Service impact : Racks will be unavailable during maintenance, we will only shut down one rack at a time and put it back into service before moving on to the next.
- E102H08 starts at 06:30 UTC and ends at 08:30 UTC
- E102H09 starts at 09:00 UTC and ends at 11:00 UTC
Service improvement : We need to perform preventive maintenance on our cooling system.

entry.title: [RBX1][Dedicated Servers] - 06D01
entry.content:
Apr 20, 06:04 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 20/04/2023 04:56 UTC
End Time : 20/04/2023 04:59 UTC
Root cause : Incident caused by a failure on a cooling system module.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Apr 20, 05:49 UTC
Identified - Start time : 20/04/2023 04:56 UTC
Service impact : Some servers are unreachable.
Root cause : Incident caused by a failure on a cooling system module.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on this issue.
